arStrings.szText: After channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c} for {c_number}[PowerTag.Sorcerer_Incinerate."Script Formula 58"]{/c} seconds it deals {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Critical Fire damage per second for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Casting {c_important}Incinerate{/c} refreshes and maintains this bonus.
